extDescription.message: A browser extension designed to optimize your learning experience on Google Cloud Skills Boost.

optionsPageTitle.message: Google Cloud Skills Boost - Helper Options

optionsPageDescription.message: Customize your experience with Google Cloud Skills Boost - Helper.

errorInvalidUrl.message: Please enter a valid URL starting with 'https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/xxx

notePleaseSetUpTheSettings.message:

descriptionEnableSearchFeature.message: Show Google Search and YouTube buttons when no solution is found.

messageSearchFeatureEnabled.message: Search feature enabled - Google and YouTube search buttons will appear when no solution is found

messageSearchFeatureDisabled.message: Search feature disabled - Only "No solution" will be shown when no solution is found

tourWelcomeTitle.message: Welcome to the Account Creation Guide!

tourWelcomeContent.message: We will guide you step by step to create your first Google Cloud Skills Boost account.

tourWelcomeTip.message: Tip: You can skip this guide at any time by clicking "Skip".

tourAddAccountContent.message: Click this button to add your first Google Cloud Skills Boost account. You can manage multiple accounts simultaneously.

tourAccountListContent.message:
After creating accounts, they will appear here. You can:
‚Ä¢ Switch between accounts
‚Ä¢ Update arcade points data
‚Ä¢ Edit nicknames
‚Ä¢ View public profiles

tourModalStep1Content.message: Click this button to open Google Cloud Skills Boost Profile in a new tab. You will need to log in and get the URL from the profile page.

tourModalStep2Content.message: After logging in, copy the URL from the address bar and paste it here.

tourModalStep3Content.message: Click this button to create the account. The system will automatically fetch information from the profile and create a new account for you.

tourCompletedContent.message: Now you can start creating your first account.

tourModalCompletedContent.message: Try entering a profile URL and create your first account.

errorAccountExistsMsg.message: An account with this URL already exists: "$1".

errorNoNameFromProfile.message: Unable to get name from profile. Please try again!

errorAddAccountGeneric.message: An error occurred while adding the account. Please try again!
